CustomField.formula: CASE( MONTH( EC_Last_Purchased_Date__c ) , 1, "Jan", 2, "Feb", 3, "Mar", 4, "Apr", 5, "May", 6, "Jun", 7, "Jul", 8, "Aug", 9, "Sep", 10, "Oct", 11, "Nov", 12, "Dec", "None") +' '+ text(DAY( EC_Last_Purchased_Date__c )) +', '+ Text(YEAR( EC_Last_Purchased_Date__c ))
CustomField.label: Last Purchased Date Formatted
